game.name: Champions of Chaxia
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Detailed, gritty text-based fantasy RPG centered on realistic gladiatorial combat. Recreates the gameplay of the old gamebooks. Hassle-free inventory management and a battle system that combines dice rolls with tactical decisions.
